results.title: Association of metformin with mortality or ARDS in patients with COVID-19 and type 2 diabetes: A retrospective cohort study
results.text_hl: In the subgroup analysis, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use was associated with the lower incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@ARDS@@@ in females.

results.title: Prior metformin therapy and 30-day mortality in patients with acute respiratory distress syndrome: a nationwide cohort study.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ users were defined as those prescribed continuous oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for >=30 days before @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@ARDS@@@ diagnosis.

results.title: [Metformin: one of the possible options to reduce the mortality of severe coronavirus disease 2019?]
results.journal: Zhonghua Wei Zhong Bing Ji Jiu Yi Xue
results.text_hl: It was speculated that the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for controlling @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood glucose@@@ in severe @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ may prevent or inhibit the occurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@ARDS@@@, thereby reducing the mortality of @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Pan Y, Han R, He Y. [Metformin: one of the possible options to reduce the mortality of severe coronavirus disease 2019?] Zhonghua Wei Zhong Bing Ji Jiu Yi Xue. 2020 Sep;32(9):1131-1134. PMID: 33081905

results.title: Metformin is associated with lower hospitalizations, mortality and severe coronavirus infection among elderly medicare minority patients in 8 states in USA
results.text_hl: The RH of @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@ARDS@@@ for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users was 0.32; 95% CI 0.22-0.45.

results.title: Efficacy and safety of metformin compared to insulin in gestational diabetes: a systemic review and meta-analysis of Chinese randomized controlled trials.
results.text_hl: In the main analysis, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ had lower risk of @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@respiratory distress syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@RDS@@@, OR, 0.28; 95% CI 0.16-0.51; P < 0.0001), @DISEASE_Premature_Birth @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@premature birth@@@ (OR, 0.42; 95% CI 0.21-0.85, P = 0.02), and @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@neonatal hypoglycemia@@@ (OR, 0.34; 95% CI 0.24-0.48; P < 0.00001) compared to @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@.

citations.NLM: Li F, Liu L, Hu Y, Marx CM, Liu W. Efficacy and safety of metformin compared to insulin in gestational diabetes: a systemic review and meta-analysis of Chinese randomized controlled trials. Int J Clin Pharm. 2022 Oct;44(5):1102-1113. PMID: 35834091

results.title: Metformin as Adjunctive Therapy for Pediatric Patients With Hidradenitis Suppurativa.
results.text_hl: Two @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ discontinued @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy due to side effects, including @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@gastrointestinal distress@@@ and mood changes; the third @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ discontinued due to lack of improvement.
